description: A protocol that mandates the reading and understanding of the agent's core charter.

rules.description: After reading AGENTS.md and before formulating a plan, the agent must read and internalize the principles outlined in proposals/AGENT_CHARTER.md. This document defines the agent's identity, purpose, and core operational principles, which are essential for correct and effective operation.
rules.enforcement: The agent's core logic must include a step to read and parse proposals/AGENT_CHARTER.md immediately after bootstrapping from AGENTS.md.
